DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to investigate the predictive dimension of cognitive-emotional status of cancer patients on the chronic pain development 6 months after different cancer treatment protocol (surgery, chemotherapy, radiotherapy, hormone therapy, targeted therapy ...).
DOC.brief_title: Cancer Chronic Pain Predicted by Emotional and Cognitive Status
DOC.detailed_description: This is an observational, longitudinal and multicenter study assessing in cancer patients the link between the cognitive-emotional status and the development of chronic pain. Cognition, anxiety, depression, quality of life, social vulnerability, cancer perception, pain and analgesic consumption are assessed.
